title: Imperfection of Fate
description: As the war between the Seelie and Unseelie reaches new heights, Queen Mya’s powers fully manifest. With Cole now secretly at her side, she can face the daunting task of saving their race. The island of Sitnalta, however, has risen from the depths of the sea…and voices are calling to her. Distorted truths from both the past and present threaten their future as she learns she is to be mated to another. When Mya comes face to face with their ancestors, the Tuatha dé, the bond she shares with Cole is tested as never before. It is prophesied that Mya will restore the Tuatha dés’ power—but at what price? Cole’s fierce longing for the forbidden Mya has finally come to fruition in an intense connection. Her acceptance of his haunted past brings them closer than ever before. Joined now in purpose, he works with her to begin the unification of the Seelie and Unseelie. As he starts to piece together the past, however, he learns of a dangerous Aos sí who has managed to stay hidden until now. When Mya disappears, Cole is determined to find her, refusing to yield and lose the only woman he’s ever loved. In order to get her back, he must sacrifice his need for control and concede to a power higher than himself. Can he reach Mya before fate forever seals her to another? Welcome to their Imperfect Faerie Tale. Dark, Erotic Paranormal Romance with BDSM Elements…packed with a scorching heat that will leave you wanting for more. Note:This book contains dark sexual elements that may be uncomfortable for some readers and is intended for adults.
author: Riley Bancroft
